warning_signs: Swelling, shortness of breath, decreased urine output
discharge_instructions: Monitor blood pressure daily, weigh yourself daily

warning_signs: Decreased urine output, confusion, chest pain
discharge_instructions: Drink 2-3 liters of water daily, rest adequately

warning_signs: Severe fatigue, irregular heartbeat, confusion
discharge_instructions: Prepare for dialysis discussion, monitor weight daily

dietary_restrictions: Low sodium diet, moderate protein intake
warning_signs: Increased swelling, difficulty breathing, blood in urine
discharge_instructions: Monitor for infections, check urine protein at home

dietary_restrictions: Diabetic diet, low sodium, protein restriction
warning_signs: Blood sugar below 70 or above 300, chest pain
discharge_instructions: Monitor blood sugar 4 times daily, maintain glucose log

warning_signs: Severe back pain, blood in urine, fever
discharge_instructions: Drink plenty of water, avoid contact sports

warning_signs: Fever, severe swelling, blood in urine
discharge_instructions: Avoid infections, wear mask in public places

dietary_restrictions: Increase fluid intake, limit sodium and animal protein
warning_signs: Severe pain, fever, inability to urinate
discharge_instructions: Strain urine for stones, drink 3 liters water daily

warning_signs: Confusion, chest pain, severe itching
discharge_instructions: Prepare for hemodialysis, attend dialysis education class

warning_signs: Severe headache, vision changes, chest pain
discharge_instructions: Monitor blood pressure twice daily, maintain BP log

warning_signs: Decreased urine output, confusion, swelling
discharge_instructions: Maintain adequate hydration, rest

warning_signs: Blood in urine, significant swelling, high blood pressure
discharge_instructions: Monitor blood pressure, report any hematuria

warning_signs: Severe headache, chest pain, sudden weakness
discharge_instructions: Monitor blood pressure, prepare for possible angioplasty

warning_signs: Fever, joint pain, rash, blood in urine
discharge_instructions: Avoid sun exposure, take medications as prescribed

warning_signs: Increased swelling, difficulty breathing
discharge_instructions: Monitor urine protein with dipsticks

warning_signs: Swelling, decreased urine output, fatigue
discharge_instructions: Monitor blood pressure, maintain healthy lifestyle

follow_up: Oncology in 1 week, Nephrology in 1 month
warning_signs: Fever, severe pain, bleeding from incision
discharge_instructions: Keep incision clean, avoid heavy lifting

warning_signs: Increased swelling, blood in urine, fever
discharge_instructions: Check tacrolimus levels monthly, avoid live vaccines

warning_signs: Dark urine, muscle pain, weakness
discharge_instructions: Drink plenty of fluids, avoid strenuous exercise

warning_signs: Hearing changes, vision problems, blood in urine
discharge_instructions: Regular hearing and vision checks

warning_signs: Decreased urine output, swelling
discharge_instructions: Drink plenty of water, avoid further contrast studies

warning_signs: Increased swelling, blood in urine, fever
discharge_instructions: Monitor cyclosporine levels, check blood pressure daily

warning_signs: Fever, decreased urine output, pain over transplant
discharge_instructions: Take immunosuppressants exactly as prescribed, check temperature daily

warning_signs: Severe swelling, shortness of breath, irregular heartbeat
discharge_instructions: Monitor for infections, check weight daily

warning_signs: Bloody diarrhea, decreased urine output, confusion
discharge_instructions: Practice good hygiene, avoid raw foods

primary_diagnosis: Chronic Kidney Disease Stage 3 with Anemia
warning_signs: Severe fatigue, chest pain, shortness of breath
discharge_instructions: Take iron on empty stomach, monitor for side effects
